data.lyric:
[ti:Every Little Thing]
[ar:Russell Dickerson]
[al:Yours]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Every Little Thing - Russell Dickerson
[00:05.80]Written by：Casey Brown/Russell Dickerson/Parker Welling
[00:11.61]My baby she's Alabama
[00:14.22]A Dixie land delight kissin' me like molasses
[00:19.14]Slow and sweet mhm just right
[00:21.93]She's an endless August summer yeah sunshine 365
[00:26.87]When she forgets the punch line
[00:29.22]It still gets me every time
[00:31.76]'Cause I love every little every little
[00:35.60]Every little thing about her love
[00:38.76]Just a little just a little just a little ain't enough
[00:43.89]Gotta get a gotta get a
[00:45.85]Get a little more of all she does
[00:49.21]I'm all hung up 'cause I love
[00:54.14]Every little every little
[00:56.02]Every little thing about her love
[00:58.70]
[01:07.25]Yeah she's Seattle and Sonoma
[01:10.05]Runs on coffee and red wine
[01:12.89]She's easy like Sunday morning and wild like Saturday night
[01:17.94]She's 24 carat goodness an angel's all I see
[01:23.13]She dresses up for everything
[01:25.05]
[01:25.71]But she only dress down for me
[01:27.97]And I love every little every little
[01:31.79]Every little thing about her love
[01:34.87]Just a little just a little just a little ain't enough
[01:40.12]Gotta get a gotta get a
[01:42.02]Get a little more of all she does
[01:44.86]
[01:45.36]I'm all hung up 'cause I love
[01:50.31]Every little every little
[01:52.25]Every little thing about her love
[01:54.91]
[02:01.32]Com'on
[02:01.75]
[02:09.23]My baby she's Alabama
[02:11.64]My Dixie land delight
[02:14.17]She's everybody's dream girl but she's all mine
[02:20.37]And I love every little every little
[02:24.11]Every little thing about her love
[02:27.22]Just a little just a little
[02:29.23]Just a little ain't enough
[02:31.86]
[02:32.41]Gotta get a gotta get a
[02:34.39]Get a little more of all she does
[02:37.07]
[02:37.71]I'm all hung up 'cause I love
[02:42.57]Every little every little
[02:44.56]Every little thing about her love
[02:47.24]

data.trans:
[ti:Every Little Thing]
[ar:Russell Dickerson]
[al:Yours]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.80]//
[00:11.61]我的宝贝 她来自阿拉巴马
[00:14.22]为我带来新的喜悦 她的吻像蜜糖一样可口
[00:19.14]轻柔又甜美 恰到好处
[00:21.93]她像夏日一样 热情似火 每天都活力十足
[00:26.87]虽然她口拙
[00:29.22]但总能触动到我
[00:31.76]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[00:35.60]我都喜欢不已
[00:38.76]哪怕再多一点点 一点点也不能满足我
[00:43.89]我要知道
[00:45.85]知道更多关于她的一切
[00:49.21]我心绪不宁 一直在想她 因为
[00:54.14]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[00:56.02]我都喜欢不已
[00:58.70]
[01:07.25]她既高高在上又平易近人
[01:10.05]她像咖啡一样让人上瘾 又像红酒一样让人沉醉
[01:12.89]她像周日的清晨随和安逸 又像周六的夜晚热情奔放
[01:17.94]她是真正的女神 是我亲眼所见的天使
[01:23.13]在其他人面前 她总是精心打扮
[01:25.05]
[01:25.71]可在我面前 她未施粉黛
[01:27.97]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[01:31.79]我都喜欢不已
[01:34.87]哪怕再多一点点 一点点也不能满足我
[01:40.12]我要知道
[01:42.02]知道更多关于她的一切
[01:44.86]
[01:45.36]我心绪不宁 一直在想她 因为
[01:50.31]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[01:52.25]我都喜欢不已
[01:54.91]
[02:01.32]来吧
[02:01.75]
[02:09.23]我的宝贝 她来自阿拉巴马
[02:11.64]为我带来新的喜悦
[02:14.17]她是大众情人 可她现在只属于我
[02:20.37]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[02:24.11]我都喜欢
[02:27.22]哪怕再多一点点
[02:29.23]一点点也不能满足我
[02:31.86]
[02:32.41]我要知道
[02:34.39]知道更多关于她的一切
[02:37.07]
[02:37.71]我心绪不宁 一直在想她 因为
[02:42.57]就连她喜欢的一点一滴
[02:44.56]我都喜欢
[02:47.24]
[02:50.70]她喜欢的一切
[02:52.62]
[02:54.39]//

[03:06.06]她喜欢的一切
